channel.title: sqlplus variables on Blog and reference
channel.description: Recent content in sqlplus variables on Blog and reference

item.title: How to use sqlplus substitution variables
item.description: I didn’t know you could do this. Its quite handy! SQL> column name new_value dbname SQL> select name from v$database; XXX1 SQL> spool test_&dbname SQL> select sysdate from dual; 03-JUL-06 SQL> spool off SQL> host dir /od *.lst 03/07/2006 13:16 61 test_XXX1.LST SQL>
